scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps --dist-dir docs --public-url /mail_smooth_web/ --no-optimize && cp -r tutorial/pages docs/tutorial/ && cp tutorial/tutorial-config.json docs/tutorial/ && cp src/tutorial/tutorial-widget.js docs/tutorial/ && cp src/tutorial/tutorial-widget.css docs/tutorial/ && sed -i 's|</head>|<link rel="stylesheet" href="/mail_smooth_web/tutorial/tutorial-widget.css"></head>|' docs/index.html && sed -i 's|</body>|<script src="/mail_smooth_web/tutorial/tutorial-widget.js"></script></body>|' docs/index.html
